description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Taxonomy Arabian Temnothorax Mayr Formicidae', 'cybertype' | Myrmicinae) with description of a new species enhanced by x-ray microtomography | 3D model by Economolab (@arilab) | Temnothorax sp.
